name: @stawa/gtts
author: Stawa
description: This project converts written material into speech by using Google AI (Gemini) for text creation or internet searches.

scripts.version: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); try { const tag = execSync('git describe --tags --abbrev=0').toString().trim(); const version = tag.startsWith('v') ? tag.slice(1) : tag; const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8')); if (pkg.version !== version) { execSync('npm --no-git-tag-version version ' + version, { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('Version updated to ' + version); } else { console.log('Version unchanged: ' + version); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error updating version:', error.message); process.exit(0); }"
